Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-36623 affecting package moby-cli for versions less than 24.0.9-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-36623 affecting package moby-cli for versions less than 24.0.9-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-cli is earlier than 24.0.9-5, affected by CVE-2024-36623
